description:
As a consumer shopping for a new credit card
  I want to estimate my rewards based on my monthly spending patterns
  So that I can compare Scotiabank cards and select the best option for me

steps.name: Given the user has navigated to the Scotiabank credit card rewards calculator
Given the user is on the "Detailed spend" tab
When the user enters "300" in "Groceries and drug stores"
And the user enters "200" in "Bill payments"
And the user enters "150" in "Entertainment and dining"
And the user enters "50" in "Home improvements"
And the user enters "70" in "All other purchases"
And the total monthly spend is displayed
And the user clicks the "Calculate rewards" button
Then a results page should be displayed
And it should summarise the total monthly spend as "$950"
